abstract: La Martinière will split revenue with Google Books from digital sales of its out-of-print, copyright-protected works.
snippet: La Martinière will split revenue with Google Books from digital sales of its out-of-print, copyright-protected works.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — A second French publisher has reached a deal on digital books with Google to settle a copyright lawsuit in exchange for control over how its out-of-print, copyright-protected works are scanned and sold.

headline.main: In France, Publisher and Google Reach Deal
headline.print_headline: In France, Publisher And Google Reach Deal
